task_intent.title: 013-multi-select-gallery-with-bulk-actions
task_intent.description: Add multi-select mode to the unified image gallery with bulk actions toolbar (Download ZIP, Delete Selected, Move to Folder). Enable Shift+click for range selection and Ctrl+click for toggle selection.
